i have a 32-bit computer(x86) and im wondering if i will be able to chose between 32 or 64 during the installation. my computer says its 64-bit compatible. any answer will be appreciated.

@xXc00kiezXx: with this version, no, you cant choose between 32bit or 64bit when you install. This torrent is the x86 (32bit) version.
But you can install 32bit or 64bit on your computer any version you like. Search google for the different between those two.
Basically you want to use x86 version for any computer with 4gb of ram, and 2 cpu cores or less. If you have 4 cpu cores and 6+gb of ram you want to use x64 version.

People...He usually release the ultimate version first because it's obvious that it's easier to do because of its size. Thank you for this and now downloading.
